name: HyperBall (itch) (MAGES Institute of Excellence, maname)
description:
Hyperball is a new exciting puzzle game inspired by games like Q.U.B.E and Portal. The goal is to get the green ball on the platform and you can use 3 types of blocks to do so. Blocks that can either spawn objects, push objects, or that extend.

Middle mouse to move blocks around and choose guns by clicking 1, 2 ,3. 

Happy Puzzeling
